title: Array Labs raises $20 million to scale production of radar satellites for 3D Earth mapping
description:
Startup aims to mass-produce radar hardware and deploy formation-flying satellites

The post Array Labs raises $20 million to scale production of radar satellites for 3D Earth mapping appeared first on SpaceNews.
